storyInfo: Reynell is deported, El Capitán goes on trial, and the Galería unexpectedly falls into the community's hands. Team Rainbow is stumped as they think on how to get home, and their future on Terra.

attributes.content: If I recall correctly it's my lunch break now, so any interrogation will have to wait until—
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: I'm not here for that.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: It's you...
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: What now? Does Rhodes Island want to trample on my corpse too? By all means.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: I'm only here on behalf of Ms. Candela to inform you of Dossoles's decision on how to handle you.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: The Dossoles Mayoral Office has determined that they will not try you for your crimes.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Let me guess. You're handing me over to the Coalition government?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Mateo's an idiot, but he's still the Coalition's representative in Dossoles.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Hmm... I've toyed with him so much the Coalition is probably itching to tear me apart.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: That's an accurate reading of your situation. The Coalition government wants to haul you to La Unidad for a trial, just like Mateo.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: A public trial? Great, I'm looking forward to it.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: No, Señor Reynell.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: You're being sent back to Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: ...Come again?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: The General Chamber of Commerce is pressuring Candela to send you back to Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: COME AGAIN?!
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Your father's KGCC contacts pulled some strings, and you no longer have to remain in Dossoles. So instead of heading to La Unidad, you can go home.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: No... I'm not going back.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: I'm not going back to that utterly despicable, depraved, and deplorable...
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: You don't have a say here, Señor Reynell. It's your own reckless actions bringing you wherever your final destination may be.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: You have to swallow your medicine, be it sweet or bitter.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Old man... You're never going to leave me alone, are you?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Right, there's one more thing. You need to decide where your assets are going.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: You say it like I have a choice in the matter. Hasn't Candela already used all the methods at her disposal to move them elsewhere?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: There are some... fixed assets that nobody dares to take...
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Just write any name on this transfer contract.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Fine... I'll just write the name of whoever wanders by next—
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Señor Diaz, what are you doing here?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Identifying Mateo's men. The ones who were playing hostage earlier. And you? What did you call me for? Need something?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: N-No.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Adios, then.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Say... you... anyway, you haven't given a name yet, right? You can always take back what you—
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: I never go back on my word.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Besides... this isn't such a bad choice.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Let a genuine art lover have it.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Reynell really put that old firefighter's name on it?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Yes. I confirmed it one last time as I was escorting him out of Dossoles, and he didn't change his mind.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: He really inherited none of his father's qualities.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Honestly, he would probably appreciate that evaluation.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Of course, but I didn't mean it as a compliment.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Lady Candela. Your coffee, as well as Ernesto's.
attributes.name: Mayor's Bodyguard

attributes.content: The aroma is so strong! What beans did you use for this, Señor Booker?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: A triple dark roast blend Lady Candela has been drinking lately. Please enjoy.
attributes.name: Mayor's Bodyguard

attributes.content: Any plans to catch up with old friends now that everything has died down?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I wasn't intending to bother anyone before I got to the city, actually.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Indeed you wouldn't have, if that whole ruckus didn't happen. But you know how it is in Dossoles. Never a quiet day for us.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: ...Yeah.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Just like now, Reynell's antics have dealt a heavy blow to the Coalition government's influence.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: La Unidad has been issuing letters of protest, but they can only dream of getting Reynell and his assets. Dossoles is not at their beck and call.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: The other two factions are also itching to get their hands on him—
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Oh, look at me. I seem to have slipped into a meaningless ramble.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: No, not at all, this is very important information.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Alright, Ernesto. Have a taste and see if this blend is to your liking.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: It's so strong... but the texture is fantastic.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Do elaborate.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I can discern each bean's species and aroma, but I can't tell which bean has the biggest ratio in the blend.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: All three aromas are fighting to come out on top, but soon they all converge into a strong and unified caramelized flavor.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Precisely.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: The main selling point of this blend is that the blend ratio isn't set in stone, but you still get that caramel flavor as long as their proportions are roughly balanced.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: So, does it suit your taste?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Still can't decide?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: It's alright, the shop is just over there. You can always try a second cup, as long as you come back.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: They'll even modify the blend to your ideal ratio, or you can ask them to brew you a cup with sparkling water.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Haha, you're joking.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: A joke? I wouldn't say so.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Because I really am looking forward to seeing what you choose, Ernesto.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Yo, Ernesto. Your chat with Mayor Candela took forever.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: I had no choice. We go way back and have too many things to talk about.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: She must still like you if you guys talked for that long.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: I guess so.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Hmph... always clamping up so fast whenever it's time to talk about you.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Fine, since you're so unwilling to talk, I don't have to ask you, hehe...
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Rafaela won't tell you, even if you ask.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: How did you know I was gonna ask her? Do you have mind-reading Arts or something?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: It's written all over your face.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Ooh, scary man we have here.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: By the way, I already knew this morning we would be late, and I appreciate that you've been waiting for me the whole time, but we've already missed our appointment with Diaz, you know?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: —Oh, shit!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Well then, Mr. Reynell Kowalski. Please get in the car while I fetch your luggage.
attributes.name: A General Chamber of Commerce Employee

attributes.content: Reynell sits in the back with a blank expression. The door shuts, and it feels slightly warm, so he takes off his coat and leans back as he begins to loosen his collar.
A strange noise outside the car interrupts him, and he turns to look out the window. The General Chamber of Commerce employee lies on the ground, unconscious.
He then hears a tapping noise from the opposite window, and follows the sound to see a familiar face standing outside the car.
Reynell rolls down the window and sees a pair of dark eyes.
Mind giving me a ride, sir?
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: And where are you wanting to go?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Hasn't that always been up to you to decide?
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: You've been following me for a while, so maybe this time you take the lead and decide our destination.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Do you really have nowhere you want to go, Miłosz?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: It'll be the same as before, no matter where we go, yes?
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Things are different this time. I'm broke, aside from the two suitcases in the trunk.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Then I'll drive until our fuel runs out, and we'll go wherever the car takes us.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Well... fine, you're the one in charge now.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Miłosz smiles at Reynell, and gets into the driver's seat, looking at the other face through the rearview mirror before starting the engine.
There is a blend of confusion, delight and a slight hint of hesitation on Reynell's face.
You seem like you have something to ask me.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Why did you come back? Why didn't you leave?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Don't you already know the answer?
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Maybe my question was to confirm that answer.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Don't be so sure. My patience might run out on you and you'll find I leave pretty soon.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: But not today.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: No, not today.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Miłosz looks away from the mirror, starts the engine, and the silver car sets off.
Galería Krysztauowa's exhibition hall is still the same as it was the other day.
Shattered glass cases, scorched ground, cracks in the walls; colorful spotlights, wanton graffiti, and frantic music going wild...
Everything is the same except the additional presence of a big round table in the center of the room.
A grill sizzles on the table at the perfect temperature, emanating an enticing aroma.
Well, why isn't anyone ordering? Not hungry?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: I didn't expect you to turn the place into a barbecue restaurant.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Hah. The building got bombed into a war zone, and the art can't stay here anymore. So I thought, we might as well turn it into a side gig instead of leaving it empty.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: The TV stations in Dossoles lost their money-maker Reynell, so now they've started sticking their noses here and spreading rumors that none of our artists can cook and just survive on dried cactus.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: So I have to show them what true Bolívarian cuisine is!
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Then, I'll have one of those onion and mushroom meat skewers—
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Make it two.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Coming right up!
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Hmm... Mr. Diaz's really good at this.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: I have to be honest, we've traveled all over Terra, but this is the first time we've tasted Bolívarian BBQ.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Where have you all been?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: We started from the Sargonian desert, and after a brief stay on Rhodes Island where we got our 'Team Rainbow' moniker, we each went off to a few more places.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: The rainforests of Sargon, the icefields of Sami, Columbia's mines and cities, villages in the Ursus taiga...
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Even so, we've only ever set foot on a small piece of these lands.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: My only regret is burying Levi Klitschko under the sands of Sargon along with his mad lab.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: If you're homesick, you'll have to start thinking of a different way to go back.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Have you found one?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: (shrugs) Not even a lead.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: I guess you wouldn't mind a few more traveling companions on your quest?
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Hahaha. The more the merrier!
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Uh, Lord, what is that...?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Everyone, let me, on behalf of Lord, introduce this 'Ursus Specialty Beverage'—
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: There is a sudden noise outside the window.
The members of Team Rainbow turn their heads full of food and drink toward the source of the noise, wondering what kind of trouble has erupted this time—
And then, the first one to realize what is going on shrugs in resignation.
Papá says it's our turn to dance our Vulpo minuet today, so turn off your classical music!
attributes.name: Community Artist

attributes.content: But Tecno says she likes our triple meter waltz! Go and ask her if you don't believe me, she's over by the wall!
attributes.name: Destitute Noble

attributes.content: Yeah, exactly!
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: Come over here, Tecno. What do you make of this?
attributes.name: Community Artist

attributes.content: Hmph, don't bother me with this kinda stuff!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: If you can spare the time to argue over what music to play, then maybe take a look at my work!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Your work? But your hand...
attributes.name: Community Artist

attributes.content: Oh, just come over and you'll see.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Wow! You... you drew this yourself?
attributes.name: Community Artist

attributes.content: Haha! I practiced a lot, and I'm finally used to drawing with my left hand—
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Forget about the doodles and get your butt inside, Tecno! You have to try this 'Ursus Specialty Beverage' before they down the last drop of it! It's truly something else!
attributes.name: Diaz
